long_description: A great alternative to full-feature kayak saddles, this Thule Top Deck Kayak carrier includes everything you need to transport a kayak safely and securely. Custom-designed saddle conforms to multiple hull shapes. Integrated rubber pads provide maximum kayak protection. Virtually eliminates hot spots with the large contact surface area. Fits Thule rack systems, round bars and most factory-installed cross bars. Complete carrier for 1 boat includes 4 saddles, all mounting hardware, heavy-duty straps and bow and stern tie-downs.
short_description: A great alternative to full-feature kayak saddles, this Thule Top Deck Kayak carrier includes everything you need to transport a kayak safely and securely.
